Load characteristics of the different MODIS products

Source: R/load_prodopts.R
load_prodopts.Rd

FUNCTION_DESCRIPTION

load_prodopts(gui)

Arguments

gui

logical if TRUE, the function was called from an interactive MODIStsp session.

Value

OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION

Details

Load characteristics of the different MODIS products from prodopts_file
